_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime

_a-0000e4b1-2fbc-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionPrecedent

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel

_a-0000e460-9d93-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_REF_responseRequirements

_a-0000e6d1-2aad-8000-9bdd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_GRD_questionnaireChangesAudit
_a-0000e6d1-2aad-8000-9bdd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
  local!questionnaireTemplate: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionnaire_Template(
    questionnaireTemplateId: ri!questionnaireTemplateId,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    isActive: { true, false },
    getAllRelatedRecord: true()
  ),
  {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
      label: "Questionnaire History",
      data: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_QE_getQuestionnaireTemplateAudits(
        questionnaireTemplateId: ri!questionnaireTemplateId,
        executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!questionnaireTemplateId),
        returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
        pagingInfo: fv!pagingInfo
      ),
      rowHeader: 1,
      columns: {
        /*Username*/
        rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UI_userImageAndDisplayNameGridColumns(
          usernameField: "username",
          label: "",
          allowSorting: false,
          width: "NARROW"
        ),
        /*Modification*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
            bundleKey: "lbl_Modification",
            bundle: local!bundle
          ),
          align: "",
          value: rule!AS_GCM_DSP_modificationCommentForQuestionnaireTemplateAudit(
            questionnaireTemplateAudit: fv!row,
            questionnaireTemplate: local!questionnaireTemplate,
            bundle: local!bundle
          ),
          width: "WIDE"
        ),
        /*Time*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
          label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
            bundleKey: "lbl_Time",
            bundle: local!bundle
          ),
          value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(datetime: fv!row.timestamp),
          sortField: "timestamp",
          align: "END",
          width: "NARROW_PLUS"
        )
      },
      borderStyle: "LIGHT",
      shadeAlternateRows: true,
      pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM,
      initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "timestamp", ascending: false),
      secondarySorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: "questionnaireTemplateAuditId",
        ascending: false
      ),
      emptyGridMessage: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundleKey: "ins_Nohistory",
        bundle: local!bundle
      )
    )
  }
)

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
  text: displayvalue(
    ri!actionCode,
    {
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
      cons!AS_GCM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_COPY,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_FINALIZE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_FINALIZATION_FAILED,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_VALIDATE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_VALIDATION_FAILED,
      cons!AS_GCM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_VALIDATION_UPDATE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MANUAL_SYNC,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD_WEEKLY_SYNC,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY_WEEKLY_SYNC,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD_TEMPLATE_FILE_IMPORT,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD_ZIP_IMPORT,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY_ZIP_IMPORT,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_BULK_CLAUSE_UPDATE,
      cons!AS_GCM_CEDM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
      cons!AS_GCM_CEDM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
      cons!AS_GCM_CEDM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE,
      cons!AS_GCM_CEDM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE
    },
    {
      "",
      "Copied",
      rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        bundleKey: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!deleteLabel,
          default: "txt_Deleted"
        )
      ),
      rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        bundleKey: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!deactivateLabel,
          default: "txt_Deactivated"
        )
      ),
      "",
      rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        bundleKey: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!activatedLabel,
          default: "txt_Activated"
        )
      ),
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      "",
      rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        bundleKey: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!activatedLabel,
          default: "txt_Activated"
        )
      ),
      rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        bundleKey: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!activatedLabel,
          default: "txt_Deactivated"
        )
      )
    },
    ""
  ) & " ",
  color: displayvalue(
    ri!actionCode,
    {
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
      cons!AS_GCM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_COPY,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_FINALIZE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_FINALIZATION_FAILED,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_VALIDATE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_VALIDATION_FAILED,
      cons!AS_GCM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_VALIDATION_UPDATE,
      cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MANUAL_SYNC,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD_WEEKLY_SYNC,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY_WEEKLY_SYNC,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD_TEMPLATE_FILE_IMPORT,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD_ZIP_IMPORT,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY_ZIP_IMPORT,
      cons!AS_GCM_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_BULK_CLAUSE_UPDATE,
      cons!AS_GCM_CEDM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
      cons!AS_GCM_CEDM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
      cons!AS_GCM_CEDM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE,
      cons!AS_GCM_CEDM_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE
    },
    {
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_ADDED_GREEN,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_ADDED_GREEN,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_REMOVED_RED,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_REMOVED_RED,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MODIFIED_BLUEGRAY,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MODIFIED_BLUEGRAY,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_ADDED_GREEN,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_ADDED_GREEN,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_ADDED_GREEN,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_ADDED_GREEN,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MODIFIED_BLUEGRAY,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_MISC_BLUE,
      cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_AUDIT_REMOVED_RED
    },

  ),

)

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
AS_CO_UT_queryEntity

_a-0000e6d1-2aad-8000-9bdd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DSP_displayModificationCommentForQuestionCategory

_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionnaire_Template

_a-0000e6d1-2aad-8000-9bdd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QNM_QE_getQuestionnaireTemplateAudits
_a-0000e6d1-2aad-8000-9bdd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_QNM_ENT_A_T_QUESTIONNAIRE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_A_T_Questionnaire',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!questionnaireTemplateId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "questionnaireTemplateId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!questionnaireTemplateId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "auditActionCode",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_UNCHANGED
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
          {
            ri!fields,
            index(
              ri!relatedRecordData,
              "relationship",
              null
            )
          }
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshInterval: ri!refreshInterval,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000e6c8-d132-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord

  ),

)

_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DSP_displayAuditModificationForQuestionnaireTemplate
_a-0000e6e4-7cee-8000-9bde-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!fieldName,
  equals: "name",
  equals: "description",
  equals: "questionCategoryName",
  equals: "label",
  equals: "isDefault",
  equals: "displayOrder",
  equals: "groupNumber",
  equals: "orderNumber",
  equals: "operator",
  equals: "requirementValue",
  then: ri!value,
  equals: "requirementTypeCode",
  then: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
    bundle: ri!bundle,
    bundleKey: index(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
        records: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_REF_responseRequirements(),
        field: "requirementTypeCode",
        value: ri!value
      ),
      "label",
      null
    )
  ),
  default: {}
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000e6d1-2aad-8000-9bdd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DSP_displayModificationCommentForQuestionTemplate
